about.title: About Us
about.content: We're a family-run business offering top-notch cleaning across town. Trustworthy, reliable, and friendly service every time.

services.name: Domestic Cleaning
services.description: Weekly or one-off house cleans tailored to your needs.

services.name: End of Tenancy
services.description: Full deep cleans for landlords, tenants, and agents.

services.name: Office Cleaning
services.description: Reliable commercial cleaning for workspaces of any size.

testimonials.quote: Amazing service! My home has never looked so clean.
testimonials.author: Emily P.
